cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: All Pod beds are private and include light USB and power.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

specialEventConditions.title: Please read before you book our pods.
specialEventConditions.description:
During the Christmas and New Year Holiday there are min stay restrictions. 
Christmas Restrictions  - 2 Nights 24th+ 25th.   New Year Restrictions - 3 Nights 30th+31st and 1st. 
Please call if you require more information.

Deluxe Pod in a room of 4 Bed Mixed Dorm are in 4 and 6-bed dorms but are more private. Please request the 4-bed dorm if you have a preference. No refund applies if you do not inform in advance about the special request.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 29th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 29th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
